DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety pharmacokinetic comparison DWJ1276 , combination drug Rosuvastatin Olmesartan ( test formulation ) , co-administration Rosuvastatin Olmesartan ( reference formulation ) single dose healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacokinetic Comparison Co-administration Combination Drug Rosuvastatin Olmesartan Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 20 50 within 20 % ideal body weight , without congenital abnormality chronic disease History cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , endogenous , gastrointestinal , hematologic , neurologic hemorrhagic disease ; Clinically significant finding routine laboratory ( hematology , serum chemistry urinalysis ) ECG test ; Use prescription drug 14 day immediately prior start study potential interact study medication ; Use substance could induce inhibit drug metabolism enzyme
